detail_desc: Cardigan in a soft fine knit containing some wool with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Glittery shoulder bag with a metal decoration on the front, flap with a hook and loop fastening, and shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 4x9x13.5 cm.
V-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined, print-patterned swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps and a decorative gather at the top.
Long-sleeved blouse in soft slub cotton jersey with a V-neck, decorative gathers at the shoulders and a yoke at the back.
V-neck blouse in softly draping satin with a concealed button band down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

V-neck, cold shoulder blouse in airy, crinkled fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs. Flounces at the front that continue back around the shoulders, an elasticated seam at the waist and flounce at the hem.
5-pocket superskinny-fit jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, contrasting colour panels along the sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Nightshirt in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck, frilled collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shorter polo-neck jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edges around the neck, cuffs and hem.
Sports vest top in a double layer of soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Coat in faux fur with concealed press-studs at the front, concealed pockets in the side seams and a detachable, imitation leather tie belt. Lined.
High-waisted jersey crêpe trousers with contrasting colour side stripes, an elasticated waist and flared legs with sewn-in creases.
Puffer jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets, covered elastication at the cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.
Cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with glittery buttons down the front and patch pockets.
Double-breasted, fitted jacket in felted fabric with a high stand-up collar, decorative stitching front and back, side pockets and a decorative tab at the cuffs. Lined.
Joggers in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short skirt in a stretch weave with a checked pattern, small slits at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Large earrings in metal and plastic. Length 6.5 cm.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft fleece made from recycled polyester. Jacket with a lined hood with ears on the top and a concealed zip down the front with a chin guard. Trousers with a wide, foldover waist panel made from organic cotton jersey and ribbed hems.
Thin metal hoop earrings. Diameter approx. 4.5 cm.
Mesh trainers with lacing and a loop front and the back. Mesh linings and insoles and lightweight ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.

Sports trousers in sturdy, fast-drying jersey with wide elastication at the waist for optimum fit over the tummy. Side pockets, a zipped leg pocket, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and tapered legs.
Fabric-covered, USB 2.0 charging cable suitable for iPhones 5/5c/5s and iPhone 6/6s. Length 1 m. The cable is only for charging and synchronisation via a computer.
Round shoulder bag in paper straw with a shoulder strap and zip at the top. Size 5x18.5 cm.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with an elastic strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Knee-length dressing gown in soft pile with a hood, pockets, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a flap with decorative flowers and a concealed hook and loop fastening. Narrow shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size approx. 4.5x10.5x14.5 cm.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and raw-edge hems.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with short dolman sleeves and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Sewn-on corset belt at the front with lacing.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Earrings in plastic and metal with hoops at the bottom. Length 5 cm.
Calf-length dress in a soft rib knit containing some wool with long sleeves and a wrapover front with wide ties at one side.
Clamdiggers in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Straight-style top in a soft, fine knit with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders and short, flounced sleeves.
Thin, elastic hairband decorated with fabric flowers.
Straight-cut blouse in a textured weave with short, wide puff sleeves and a concealed zip at the back.
Wide pyjama bottoms in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide, straight legs.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a button placket, chest pocket, contrasting colour elbow patches, roll-edge ribbing around the neckline and ribbed cuffs.
Cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Fully lined bikini top with wide shoulder straps.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and lace details at the sides.
Short dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed neckline and short puff sleeves with ribbed trims. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved tops in a soft cotton blend.
Jumper in a textured pima cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a V-neck, double-layered top and long sleeves.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Sleeveless dress in jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish and a detachable, faux shearling-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, a drawstring at the waist and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined in faux shearling lining at the top and a diamond-quilted weave below.
Glasses with plastic frames and clear lenses.
Long bikini top in fluted, crinkled fabric with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and discreet elastication at the hem. Gathers in the sides and an inner top with an elasticated hem. No fasteners.
Footless tights with stirrups.
Hat in soft cable-knit cotton with a sewn-on bow and ribbed hem.
Clamdiggers in a cotton Oxford weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. Front pockets, back pockets and shaping seams at the knees.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elastication around the top.
Small pouch bag with appliqués, and a zip at the top. Size 5x9x13 cm.
Balconette bra in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and straight, wide legs with creases.
Top in viscose jersey with cap sleeves and a lace yoke at the front.
Top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves, a chest pocket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Boots in sturdy pile with imitation leather details, lacing at the front with speed hooks, and elastication at the top of the shaft. Pile linings and insoles and fluted soles. Heel approx. 4.5 cm.

Short-sleeved playsuit in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover and concealed press-stud at the front. Elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist and scalloped edges at the neckline and hems. Partly lined.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cap with a sweatband in a cotton weave and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Calf-length dress in a crinkled cotton weave with flounced trims. Deep, wrapover V-neck, both front and back, horizontal ties at the back, and ties at one side of the front. Lined.
Straight-cut nightslip in soft cotton jersey with a flock print text motif on the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Straight-cut hem and slits in the sides.
Wide blouse in a lightly crêped weave with a collar, buttons down the front, short dolman sleeves and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Short-sleeved running top in fast-drying functional fabric.
Slides in cotton canvas with a large bow at the front, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
